contact.title: Contact — TenRusli Highlight Code
contact.heading: Contact
contact.description: We’d love to hear from you.

form.help: Submitting uses your email app (mailto). You can also write us directly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy — TenRusli Highlight Code
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: TenRusli Highlight Code (the “Service”) is a web app (PWA) for code highlighting. We respect your privacy.

summary.heading: Summary
summary.item1: We may use Google AdSense to serve ads.
summary.item2: For users in the EEA/UK/CH, we use a Google-certified CMP.
summary.item3: We do not sell personal data.

data.heading: Data We Process
data.body: Device data, cookies, and similar identifiers may be used for advertising and analytics according to your consent.

cookies.heading: Cookies & Consent
cookies.body: We implement Google Consent Mode v2 and a certified CMP. You can adjust your choices anytime via our cookie banner/controls.

ads.heading: Google Advertising
ads.body: Third-party vendors, including Google, may use cookies to serve ads based on your visits. You can opt out of personalized ads in your Google Ads settings.

rights.heading: Your Rights
rights.body: Subject to applicable law, you may access, correct, delete, or restrict processing. Contact us via the Contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service — TenRusli Highlight Code
terms.heading: Terms of Service

items.title: Acceptance
items.body: By accessing the Service, you agree to these terms.

items.title: Use
items.body: Do not misuse the Service, including spam, excessive scraping, or unlawful activity.

items.title: Ownership
items.body: Copyright in source code and brand assets remains with their respective owners.

items.title: Disclaimer
items.body: The Service is provided “as is” without warranties.

items.title: Limitation of Liability
items.body: We are not liable for indirect damages or data loss.

items.title: Advertising
items.body: We may display third-party ads (Google AdSense).

items.title: Changes
items.body: We may update these terms from time to time.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy — TenRusli Highlight Code
cookies.heading: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies for essential functions, analytics, and advertising (as consented).

manage.heading: Manage Preferences
manage.body: You can adjust choices using our cookie banner/controls or your browser settings.

form.help: Pengiriman menggunakan aplikasi email Anda (mailto). Anda juga dapat menghubungi langsung.

privacy.title: Kebijakan Privasi — TenRusli Highlight Code
privacy.heading: Kebijakan Privasi
privacy.intro: TenRusli Highlight Code (“Layanan”) adalah aplikasi web (PWA) untuk highlight kode. Kami menghargai privasi Anda.

summary.heading: Ringkasan
summary.item1: Kami dapat menggunakan Google AdSense untuk menayangkan iklan.
summary.item2: Untuk pengguna di EEA/UK/CH, kami menggunakan CMP tersertifikasi Google.

data.heading: Data yang Diproses
data.body: Data perangkat, cookie, dan pengenal serupa dapat digunakan untuk iklan dan analitik sesuai persetujuan Anda.

cookies.heading: Cookie & Persetujuan
cookies.body: Kami menerapkan Google Consent Mode v2 dan CMP tersertifikasi. Anda dapat menyesuaikan pilihan kapan saja melalui banner/kontrol cookie kami.

ads.heading: Periklanan Google
ads.body: Vendor pihak ketiga, termasuk Google, dapat menggunakan cookie untuk menayangkan iklan berdasarkan kunjungan Anda. Anda dapat menonaktifkan iklan personal di pengaturan Google Ads.

rights.heading: Hak Anda
rights.body: Sesuai hukum yang berlaku, Anda dapat meminta akses, koreksi, penghapusan, atau pembatasan pemrosesan. Hubungi kami via halaman Kontak.

items.title: Penerimaan
items.body: Dengan mengakses Layanan, Anda menyetujui ketentuan ini.

items.title: Penggunaan
items.body: Jangan menyalahgunakan Layanan, termasuk spam, scraping berlebihan, atau aktivitas melanggar hukum.

items.title: Kepemilikan
items.body: Hak cipta kode sumber dan aset merek tetap pada pemilik masing-masing.

items.title: Batas Tanggung Jawab
items.body: Kami tidak bertanggung jawab atas kerugian tidak langsung atau kehilangan data.

items.title: Iklan
items.body: Kami dapat menayangkan iklan pihak ketiga (Google AdSense).

items.title: Perubahan
items.body: Kami dapat memperbarui ketentuan ini dari waktu ke waktu.

cookies.title: Kebijakan Cookie — TenRusli Highlight Code
cookies.heading: Kebijakan Cookie
cookies.intro: Kami menggunakan cookie dan teknologi serupa untuk fungsi esensial, analitik, dan periklanan (sesuai persetujuan).

manage.heading: Kelola Preferensi
manage.body: Anda dapat menyesuaikan pilihan melalui banner/kontrol cookie kami atau pengaturan peramban.
